restaurant.name: Old Crown, Girton
restaurant.tagline: Authentic Nepalese cuisine & traditional pub classics
restaurant.description: Located in the charming village of Girton, just 3 miles from Cambridge city center, the Old Crown offers a unique dining experience that bridges the flavors of Nepal with traditional British pub classics.

featured.title: Chicken Momo
featured.description: Traditional Nepalese dumplings filled with seasoned chicken, served with our signature tomato chutney

featured.title: Dal Bhat
featured.description: Nepal's national dish featuring lentil soup, basmati rice, and seasonal vegetables

featured.title: Lamb Curry
featured.description: Tender lamb slow-cooked in aromatic spices with fresh herbs and traditional seasonings

featured.title: Fish & Chips
featured.description: Fresh cod in golden beer batter with hand-cut chips and mushy peas - a pub classic

featured.title: Vegetable Thali
featured.description: A complete vegetarian feast with multiple curries, rice, bread, and pickles

featured.title: Grilled Salmon
featured.description: Pan-seared salmon fillet with seasonal vegetables and herb butter

categories.name: Appetizers
categories.description: Start your meal with our delicious starters

categories.name: Nepalese Mains
categories.description: Authentic dishes from the heart of Nepal

events.title: Curry Night Special
events.description: Every Tuesday - 20% off all Nepalese curries

events.title: Pub Quiz Night
events.description: Test your knowledge every Thursday at 8pm. Prizes to be won!

events.title: Live Music Weekend
events.description: Enjoy acoustic performances in our beer garden

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.comment: Absolutely amazing food! The momos were incredible and the staff were so friendly. Will definitely be back!

testimonials.name: David Chen
testimonials.comment: Best Nepalese food in Cambridge! The dal bhat reminded me of my travels in Nepal. Authentic flavors and great atmosphere.

testimonials.name: Emma Wilson
testimonials.comment: Perfect place for a family meal. Great mix of traditional pub food and exotic Nepalese dishes. The beer garden is lovely too!
